extendedInfo.description: *** 100% FREE APP NO LOCKED ITEMS OR IN-APP PURCHASES! Ahoy candy lovers itâs time to make some candy! Get ready to unleash your creativity and create candies in this candylicious fun cooking game! Have a Candy Factory right here on your Smartphone. Make some real yummy candies and have loads of fun! Experience the sweetest and most colorful app among all your cooking and maker apps!A universe of yummy candies awaits you!!!! A delightfully satisfying experience for all candy craving people out there- Be it babies, toddlers, children and even those adults who still love, not just eating, but also making and serving candies! Enter this amazing Candy Maker app- a story world crammed full of magical fantasy, adventure and real candies. Let your child's imagination run wild with an explosion of color and creativity. Youâll feel like youâre in a Candy Farm. Bonus and enhancements all the way in this appilicious adventure! Coat it with different toppings, sprinkle, put on some decorations with paper umbrellas, sugary eyes, jelly mustaches, biscuit hat, sugar coated sprinkles, candy fruit and other little toys for your young ones to play with.  Try different types of flavors in different combinations and more coming soon- strawberry, cherry, lemon, orange, banana, kiwi, watermelon and blueberry. Sandwich your candy in tasty toppings and decorations. Make your ultimate candy, brought to you by Happy Bonbon Studios- the makers of the best kids app and games on Android.Flick through the fun and cuteness in this candy munching quest. Itâs a Candy Store- full of colorful Candies, gift boxes and lovable friends.Spread the smiles â whether itâs a Happy Birthday or any other occasion â by sharing Candy creations. Show off your candy decorating skills to your family and friends. Itâs a fun candy decorating game for kids of all ages. With this free candy maker app, everyday can be a sweet day!! Bring out the creativity little children!Candy Maker is the best candy making game available for your Android phone. So come kids- join us in this Candy Heaven. Happy BonBon Studios- makes the best kids games- proud developers of hit games: Candy Maker, Ice Candy Maker, Cupcake Maker, Fruit Juice Maker ! âHOW TO PLAY=============- To refresh yourself with nice juicy yummy candy candie at home! Mix sugar, oil,water and your favorite flavor. -Mix thoroughly the candy ingredients and heat-Pour into a mold. Let it cool for a few minutesâ¦ and voila! -Yummy candy ready! â FEATURES=============- Wallpaper Backgrounds- Pick wallpapers that suits your candy!- Fill in your candy with some tasty cream, dark chocolate, soft caramel, or tangy red sauce!- Multiple flavors to make your candy!- Choose different shapes for your candy!!!- Different types of candy fudge / frosting.- Beautiful high-quality HD-graphics.- Intuitive, easy to use interface with draggable items for better positioning- Unlimited combinations to try! Infinite possibilities in candy making!- Suitable content for little kids- A real eye candy for kids- No guns, violence, monsters, zombies or scares.Supports Android 2.2 ( Froyo ) - 4.x ( Ice Cream Sandwich / Jellybeans ) .TAGS: Candy, Maker games , Kids Games, Cooking Game,  eating, kitchen
